title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/brothermark_soludo.html
notes:
A few points:


Charles Soludo exists.
He is the governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria.
In the universe as we know it, the likelihood that he himself sent the e-mail above is 0.000%.
But you knew all that. 
And now back to our regularly scheduled scambait.

messages.body:
Attn: Beneficiary, 

I Am Prof. Chukwuma .C Soludo, CFR, The Executive Governor of the CBN. I

Determined To Make Contact With You As Of The Widespread Refuge 
Information Reaching My Office And The Severe Nature Of Guidelines In 
My Country.   

This Is To Enlighten You About Our Arrangement To Send Fund To You Via 
Cash Release As It Is The Only System That Will Be Easier For You And 
Us, We Are Going To Send Your Contract/ inheritance Part Payment Of 10 
Million United States Dollars By Way Of Courier Service.   

I Have Secured Every Desirable Document To Cover The Money. Note: The 
Money Is Coming On 2 Security Proof Boxes. The Boxes Are Sealed With 
Synthetic Nylon That Was Sealed And Padded With Machine. This Fund Was 
Brought To Us For Our Local A.F.E.M. Market, But Since The Money Was 
Not Used, I Will Use My Position As The Executive Governor of the CBN 
To Send This Fund To You.  
Please Don't Be Worried About Anything As Am Going To Finance This 
Transaction and The Boxes Are Coming With 
A Diplomatic Agent Who Will Go Along With The Boxes To Your House 
Address When Provided.   

All You Need To Do Now Is To Send To Me Your Full House Address And Your

Identity Such As, International Passport Or Drivers License Including 
Your Contact Phone & Fax Numbers For Easy Communication, The Diplomatic 
Attached Will Travel With It. He Will Call You Immediately He Arrives 
Your Country's Airport. Hope This Is All Right By You?   

I Will Enlighten You When The Special Grace Of God Will Airlift The 
Boxes. 
  
Note: The Diplomats Do Not Know The Original Contents Of The Boxes. What

I Acknowledged To Them As The Contents Is Sensitive Photographic Film 
Material. 

I Did Not Declare Money To Them Please. If They Call You And Ask You The

Contents Please Tell Them The Same Thing. Send Me An Email And I?ll 
Let You Know How Far I Have Gone With The Arrangement.   

I Will Secure The Diplomatic Immunity Clearance Certificate That Will Be

Tagged On The Boxes To Make It Stand As A Diplomatic Consignment. 

This Clearance Will Make It Pass Every Custom Checkpoint All Over The 
World Without Any Drawback. Confirm The Receipt Of This Message And 
Send The Requirements To Me Immediately You Receive This Message. 
  
Please I Need Urgent Reply Because The Boxes Are Scheduled To Be As Soon

As We Hear From You. Call Me Immediately You Receive This Message On My 
Direct Mobile Phone Number : +234-1-2206719.   

Best Regards,  

Prof. Chukwuma .C Soludo  
The Executive Governor  
CBN.
messages.raw:
Prof. Soludo
Attn: Beneficiary,

I Am Prof. Chukwuma .C Soludo, CFR, The Executive Governor of the CBN. I Determined To Make Contact With You As Of The Widespread Refuge Information Reaching My Office And The Severe Nature Of Guidelines In My Country.

This Is To Enlighten You About Our Arrangement To Send Fund To You Via Cash Release As It Is The Only System That Will Be Easier For You And Us, We Are Going To Send Your Contract/ inheritance Part Payment Of 10 Million United States Dollars By Way Of Courier Service.

I Have Secured Every Desirable Document To Cover The Money. Note: The Money Is Coming On 2 Security Proof Boxes. The Boxes Are Sealed With Synthetic Nylon That Was Sealed And Padded With Machine. This Fund Was Brought To Us For Our Local A.F.E.M. Market, But Since The Money Was Not Used, I Will Use My Position As The Executive Governor of the CBN To Send This Fund To You.

Please Don't Be Worried About Anything As Am Going To Finance This Transaction and The Boxes Are Coming With A Diplomatic Agent Who Will Go Along With The Boxes To Your House Address When Provided.

All You Need To Do Now Is To Send To Me Your Full House Address And Your Identity Such As, International Passport Or Drivers License Including Your Contact Phone & Fax Numbers For Easy Communication, The Diplomatic Attached Will Travel With It. He Will Call You Immediately He Arrives Your Country's Airport. Hope This Is All Right By You?

I Will Enlighten You When The Special Grace Of God Will Airlift The Boxes.

Note: The Diplomats Do Not Know The Original Contents Of The Boxes. What I Acknowledged To Them As The Contents Is Sensitive Photographic Film Material. I Did Not Declare Money To Them Please. If They Call You And Ask You The Contents Please Tell Them The Same Thing. Send Me An Email And I?ll Let You Know How Far I Have Gone With The Arrangement.

I Will Secure The Diplomatic Immunity Clearance Certificate That Will Be Tagged On The Boxes To Make It Stand As A Diplomatic Consignment. This Clearance Will Make It Pass Every Custom Checkpoint All Over The World Without Any Drawback. Confirm The Receipt Of This Message And Send The Requirements To Me Immediately You Receive This Message.

Please I Need Urgent Reply Because The Boxes Are Scheduled To Be As Soon As We Hear From You. Call Me Immediately You Receive This Message On My Direct Mobile Phone Number : +234-1-2206719.

Best Regards,
Prof. Chukwuma .C Soludo
The Executive Governor
CBN.

messages.body:
Dear Professor Soduko

How fortunate that you should contact me at this time. I will shortly be
arriving in Lagos on a fact finding mission for the church. Perhaps we
could meet and I can provide you with everything in person. I am sure
that this will speed things along much quicker than sending emails
backwards and forwards. Please confirm your acceptance immediately and
we can get the ball rollingv

Remain blessed and swinging


 
Brother Mark Knopfler
Church of the Sultans of Swing
Visit our Resort http://www.churchofthesultansofswing.0kn.com/
messages.raw:
Brother Mark Knopfler
To: chukwumasoludoo.charles969@gmail.com
Sent: Thursday, 17 July, 2008 3:56:18 PM

Dear Professor Soduko

How fortunate that you should contact me at this time. I will shortly be arriving in Lagos on a fact finding mission for the church. Perhaps we could meet and I can provide you with everything in person. I am sure that this will speed things along much quicker than sending emails backwards and forwards. Please confirm your acceptance immediately and we can get the ball rollingv
Remain blessed and swinging

Brother Mark Knopfler

Visit our Resort http://www.churchofthesultansofswing.0kn.com/

messages.subject: FIND THE ATTACHED COPY AND GET BACK TO ME IMMEDIATELY
messages.body:
Received: from   by
web46010.mail.sp1.yahoo.com...


ATTN:Brother Mark.
 
I RECEIVED YOUR MAIL YESTERDAY AND THE CONTENT ARE WELL NOTED.
 
SORRY I COULD NOT RESPONSE THAT YESTERDAY BECAUSE OF TOO BUSY IN MY
OFFICE AND YOU SAID YOU ARE COMING DOWN TO NIGERIA IS OK AND YOU SHOULD
KNOW THAT WE HAVE WASTED A OT OF TIME AND DO NOT HAVE MUCH TIME AND THE
DIPLOMATS ARE LEAVING THIS WEEK TO YOUR CONUTRY.
 
PLEASE BE INFORMED THAT FROM THE LATEST MEETING THIS MORNING AT THE 
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY WHERE ALL STAKE HOLDERS WERE INVOLVED INCLUDING
THE DIPLOMATIC UNIT.
 
THE FOLLOWING AGREEMENTS WERE REACHED:

BELOW ARE THE AGREED CASH PAYMENT CENTRES ACCORDING TO REGIONS AND YOU
ARE EXPECTED TO TRAVEL TO EITHER OF THIS CENTRES WHERE YOU WILL SIGN
YOUR CASH PAYMENT DOCUMENTS AND THEREBY RECIEVE THE CONSIGNMENT.

1. FOR THOSE WITHIN THE ASSIAN CONTINENT, THE PAYMENT CENTRE 
IS:MALAYSIA
2. FOR THOSE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM, THE PAYMENT CENTRE IS:LONDON
3. FOR THOSE IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, THE PAYMENT CENTRE IS: 
AMERICA
4. FOR THOSE IN THE EUROPEAN COUNTRIES,THE PAYMENT CENTRE IS: HOLLAND
5. FOR THOSE IN THE AFRICAN COUNTRIES,THE PAYMENT CENTRE IS: LONDON AND
THE UNITED ARAB EMIRATES.
6.FOR THOSE IN INDIA , THE PAYMENT CENTRE IS : INDIA

SO YOU ARE TO MAKE YOUR CHOICE OF PAYMENT CENTRE AT ANY OF THE CENTRES
SO THAT WE CAN FORWARD THE CONTACT OF THE CENTRE TO YOU FOR THE
IMMEDIATE PAYMENT.

THIS IS OUR PAYMENT SYSTEM NOW AND PLEASE DO NOT TEACH US OUR JOB AS
MOST BANK TO BANK TRANSFERS IN THE PAST WERE NOT SUCESSFUL.

FIND ATTACHED COPY OF MY WORKING ID AND INTERNATIONAL PASS PORT AND WHY
WE NEED YOUR IDENTIFICATION  TO AVIOD WRONG DELIVERING AND MAKE SURE
THAT AS SOON AS THE DIPLOMATS ARRIVE YOU FOLLOW THERE INSTRUCTIONS .

AND DO NOT DISCLOSE TO ANY BODY THE CONTENT OF THE CONSIGNMENT THAT IS
FILL WITH MONEY TILL THE CONSIGNMENT ARRIVE AT YOUR DOOR STEP.

AND ALSO YOU GET ALWAYS WRITE TO ME THROUGH MY YAHOO ACCOUNT: 

charlessoludo2271@yahoo.com AND
MAKE SURE YOU CALL ME ON MY OFFICE LINE +234-1-2206719 FOR MORE
DIRECTIVES.

 YOUR URGENT RESPONSE TO GET BACK TO ME WE BE IN YOUR FAVOUR .

 BEST REGARDS,

 PROF CHARLES SOLUDO
messages.raw:
Prof. Soludo

[Apparently the head of the Central Bank cannot make bank-to-bank transfers happen.]

messages.body:
Dear Mr Soduko

I am somewhat confused by your mail. So you are not in fact going to be
sending me anything but are asking me to travel to a different country
and something about cash payments when you have clearly told me that you
have arranged for all monies to be paid. I demand an explanation!

Remain blessed and swinging


Brother Mark Knopfler
Church of the Sultans of Swing
Visit our Resort http://www.churchofthesultansofswing.0kn.com/

messages.subject: Very Very  Urgent Response Immediately
messages.body:
ATTN: Brother Mark.
 
PLease be informed that the diplomats are leaving.
 
I promise you that the fund will get to your doorstep without any
problem. The diplomatic company that will convey the consignment to your
conutry is registered and they are only working with the federal
government of Nigeria so this is not the first time and you are not the
only person.The federal government of Nigeria seal and tag number will
be on the consignment so with the tag number your conutry customs can
not open it. The boxes will be airlifted to your address on this night
and expected to arrive in the next  morning . He will contact you
immediately he arrives for directives. Every arrangement has been
perfected.
 
WARNING: Do not tell any body  that you are expecting any money from
Nigeria until the Agent arrives your house for security reason. and iam
even registring you as one of the nigeria contractors  that is why you
should trust me and i promise that this 100%
risk free. 
 
The Diplomatic agent does not know the original content of the boxes.
Please once he arrives take the boxes inside and  Then pay the agent his
agency fees and the only money you will pay by yourself is only customs
charges in your conutry air port to aviod opening of the consignment by
them.
 
I have secured every needed documents and clearances that will protect
these consignments till it reaches its final destination. I spent a lot
of money in this transaction.
 
You are advised to call me on my direct telephone number: +234-1-2206719
for more clarification.
 
I hope to hear from you. 
 
Best Regards,
 
PROF CHARLES SOLUDO .
 
NB: This is my bank website: www.cenbank.org <http://www.cenbank.org/>
, Click About us
and click Board Member you will see my face and go through my profiles.
P/s keep
very confidential, thanks

messages.body:
Dear Charles

Im sorry that I have not been able to reply before. I have been away on
a custard skinning weekend in Bollockshire and during a custard race was
thrown from my vehicle and after some roly poly found myself jammed
against the edge of the bowl and required some spooning to masticate
myself.

If you need to contact me by phone, I have arranged that my answering
service will put your call through. Please call me on my mobile
+44xxxxxxxxxxx

Remain blessed and swinging

messages.body:
Received: from  by web46007.mail.sp1.yahoo.com via HTTP;
 ...

Diplomats Called You Follow There Instructions.




ATTN: Brother Mark.
 
I received your mail and the content are well noted.
 
Please be informed that the diplomats just lift yesterday night to
arrive in your conutry today and they will call you as soon as possible
please make sure you keep your mobile line were they can reach on there
arrivel in your conutry air poirt , so that you can keep the customs
charges ready for them to aviod opening of your consignment which is
full with fund and you know that this is the only money you are going to
spend over there is very important , as soon as the diplomats call you
coperate with them and they will move immediately to house for the hand
over of the consignment.
 
And make sure you have already concluded with your bank is very risk for
that amount to be in your house up to two days.
 
Immediately the diplomats arrive at your door step , make sure you sign
all the original documents which has already made in your name those
documents will lead you to deposit the fund into any bank of your chioce
without any question that is why you must sign all the original
documents coming with them.
 
Please make sure that your mobile line is open for the diplomats and
make sure you follow there instructions to aviod mistake in cost of
delivering and also remove your mobile line from answering machine ,
they need to get you on phone directely.
 
Immediately you hear from the diplomats make sure you get back to me and
they will tell you how much which is the customs charges over ther
immediately the arrive at the air port and tell you how you should get
the fund across to them.
 
Urgent Response.
 
Best Regards,
 
Prof Charles Soludo.

messages.body:
Dear Cahrles

I am slightly confused by your mail. While I do not claim to be an
expert, diplomatic baggage does not attract any customs charges? What
charges could there be as the contents that you have stated that are
inside the box does not attract any customs charges because gifts are
charge free. I am most concerned that whoever it is you are dealing with
is trying to scam you out of money.
I shall await their phone call and intend to challenge them because I
think they are on the take!

Remain blessed and swinging
messages.raw:
Brother Mark Knopfler
Date: Tue, 29 Jul 2008 11:33:48

Dear Cahrles

I am slightly confused by your mail. While I do not claim to be an expert, diplomatic baggage does not attract any customs charges? What charges could there be as the contents that you have stated that are inside the box does not attract any customs charges because gifts are charge free. I am most concerned that whoever it is you are dealing with is trying to scam you out of money.

I shall await their phone call and intend to challenge them because I think they are on the take!

Remain blessed and swinging

messages.body:
Dear Prof Sudoko

I have tried to call your dimplomats but it just goes through to an
answerphone. I have had my phone with me all the time and at no point
have I had a call on it from anyone, hence my email to you. I quite
frankly find your attitude appalling. I have already suggested to you
that you should not trust these people. Not only does diplomatic baggage
NOT attract customs in anyway as they are not allowed by UK law to open
the boxes but they are not answering the phone. I am really concerned
that they are bad people and trying to rip you off.

Remain blessed and swinging

messages.body:
Dear Prof Soduko

Are you sure thats the correct number? I just get a "the number you
dialled is not recognised" My answerphone is always on so if you get
your men to call and I cannot answer ( I have a lot of prayer as Im sure
you can appreciate, sometimes up to 10 times a day) get them to leave me
a message with their number, I can call them back so here it is again,
incase I got it wrong the first time... +44xxxxxxxxxxx

I am still concerned that these guys are ripping you off though. If its
diplomatic baggage then there are no charges and its against the law in
this country to open them. I would be very wary of them to be honest as
it sounds like they are taking you for a ride.

Anyway, get them to ring me asap

Remain blessed and swinging

Remain blessed and swinging
